subject: Career
title: Job Crafting: Redesigning Your Role
description: A 60-second lesson on Job Crafting: Redesigning Your Role.

hook.text: She couldn't change her job. So she changed how she did it. Her satisfaction tripled without a title change.

buildup.text: Job crafting: proactively reshaping your tasks, relationships, or mindset within your existing role.

discovery.text: Wrzesniewski and Dutton found that even hospital cleaners who crafted their jobs reported higher purpose and.

climax.text: Three types: task crafting (what you do), relational crafting (who you work with), cognitive crafting (how you see it).

punchline.text: You can't always change your job. But you can always change how you do it.
